name: cursor-clip
description: Cursor Clip - GTK4 Clipboard Manager with dynamic positioning. Features a Windows 11‚Äìstyle clipboard history, adapted to native GNOME design.
readme_summary: Cursor Clip is a GTK4 clipboard manager for Wayland that provides a Windows 11-style clipboard history with GNOME design. It dynamically positions the clipboard history at the current mouse pointer location, offering advanced Wayland integration and automatic clipboard monitoring.
key_features: Advanced Wayland Integration (Layer Shell Protocol, Precise Cursor Tracking, Multi-output Support)
primary_use_case: Managing clipboard history in a Wayland environment with dynamic positioning at the cursor location.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent librarian meticulously organizing floating snippets of text, code, and images into a neatly stacked, glowing archive that hovers near a digital cursor. The librarian uses a magnifying glass to examine each item before placing it in the archive. Small UI elements displaying timestamps and content types subtly overlay the scene. The setting is a futuristic library with soft, ambient lighting. The composition is clean and focused with a blue and purple color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: sharing
description: Sharing is a command-line tool to share directories and files from the CLI to iOS and Android devices without the need of an extra client app
readme_summary: Sharing is a command-line tool that allows users to share directories and files from their CLI to iOS and Android devices without requiring a separate client application. It supports features like clipboard sharing, file receiving, basic authentication, and SSL, making it a convenient utility for quickly transferring data between devices on the same network or over a public IP address.
primary_use_case: Sharing files and directories from a command-line interface to mobile devices without needing a dedicated client app.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly messenger pigeon, wearing a tiny server rack backpack, delivering files represented as glowing scrolls to various mobile devices (phone, tablet) perched on a windowsill. The pigeon flies through a window displaying a subtle command-line interface in the background. Digital particles stream from the pigeon, representing data transfer. The windowsill is adorned with a small QR code. The scene is set in a cozy, sunlit room. The composition is clean and focused with a warm color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: Spoolman
description: Keep track of your inventory of 3D-printer filament spools.
readme_summary: Spoolman is a self-hosted web service for managing and monitoring 3D printer filament spools. It integrates with popular 3D printing software like OctoPrint and Klipper/Moonraker to provide real-time updates on filament usage, acting as a centralized database for filament inventory.
primary_use_case: Managing and monitoring 3D printer filament spools and their usage.
cover_image_prompt: An organized librarian meticulously cataloging and weighing colorful spools of 3D printer filament in a vast, well-lit library. The librarian uses a digital scale connected to a computer displaying a filament inventory management interface. Each spool has a QR code label. Subtle UI elements float around the scene, showing filament usage statistics. The library is filled with shelves organized by filament type and manufacturer. The scene is brightly lit with a clean, organized aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a vibrant color scheme.

name: winboat
description: Run Windows apps on üêß Linux with ‚ú® seamless integration
readme_summary: WinBoat allows users to run Windows applications on Linux with seamless integration. It leverages containerization and remote desktop protocols to provide access to both individual Windows applications and the full Windows desktop environment within a Linux environment.
primary_use_case: Running Windows applications on Linux systems.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled shipwright meticulously crafting a sleek, modern boat from a collection of penguin figurines. The boat, representing Windows applications, seamlessly integrates with a vibrant Linux ocean. The shipwright uses digital tools, with subtle UI elements displaying code snippets and system resource visualizations. The scene is set in a bright, airy workshop with natural lighting. The composition is clean and focused, with a blue and green color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors, subtly incorporating the 'WinBoat' logo on the boat's sail.

name: structured-prompt-builder
description: A lightweight, browser‚Äëfirst tool for designing well‚Äëstructured AI prompts with a clean UI, live previews, a local Prompt Library, and optional Gemini‚Äëpowered prompt optimization.
readme_summary: The Structured Prompt Builder is a browser-based tool designed for crafting well-structured AI prompts. It offers features like live previews in multiple formats, a local prompt library, and integration with OpenRouter AI models for testing, making it a comprehensive solution for prompt engineering.
key_features: OpenRouter Integration (Test prompts with 100+ AI models)
Advanced Parameters (Temperature, Max Tokens, Top P, Top K, Frequency Penalty, Presence Penalty, Streaming Responses, JSON Mode)
primary_use_case: Designing and testing structured AI prompts for various AI models through OpenRouter integration.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect meticulously crafting a blueprint for a futuristic city using interactive building blocks representing prompt components. The architect uses a holographic interface to preview the blueprint in various formats, such as JSON and Markdown. Digital particles flow from the architect's hands, shaping the blocks with precision. Small UI elements display prompt parameters and model selections. The scene is set in a bright, airy studio with a minimalist design. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors.

name: FileSync
description: Send files from one device to many in real-time.

name: clipscreen
description: Mirror a portion of your screen to a virtual monitor for easier screen sharing.
readme_summary: clipscreen is a C application that mirrors a selected portion of the screen to a virtual monitor. This allows users to share only a specific area of their screen in screen sharing applications, avoiding the need to share the entire screen or individual windows.
key_features: Mirrors a portion of the screen
Highlights the selected area with a green rectangle
Allows sharing a specific area in screen sharing applications
Supports interactive area selection using hacksaw or slop
primary_use_case: Sharing a specific portion of the screen during screen sharing sessions.
cover_image_prompt: A spotlight operator meticulously adjusting a beam of light to illuminate a specific area on a stage, creating a focused display. The stage represents the main screen, and the illuminated area is mirrored onto a smaller screen beside it. The spotlight emits digital particles, subtly resembling pixels, and small UI elements are projected onto the stage floor. The scene is set in a darkened theater with dramatic lighting. The composition is focused on the spotlight and the two screens, using a blue and green color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.
